tweet_text:
This article gives the misleading impression that India permits dual citizenship: https://t.co/QJGHj3X4E6
It does not. Those who're eligible for full citizenship have to renounce foreign passports. OverseasCitizen of India status is essentially a lifelong visa, not a citizenship.
